mapper.select: select * from (select Year_And_Month as yearAndMonth, Employees_Number as employeesNumber from Enterprise_Management_Indicators_Monthly_Data where Year_And_Month between #{startTime} and #{endTime} order by Year_And_Month DESC ) as t order by yearAndMonth ASC

select * from (select Year_And_Month as yearAndMonth, Employees_AVG_Monthly_Number as employeesAVGMonthlyNumber from Enterprise_Management_Indicators_Monthly_Data where Year_And_Month between #{startTime} and #{endTime} order by Year_And_Month DESC ) as t order by yearAndMonth ASC

select * from (select Year_And_Month as yearAndMonth, Employees_AVG_Annual_Number as employeesAVGAnnualNumber from Enterprise_Management_Indicators_Monthly_Data where Year_And_Month between #{startTime} and #{endTime} order by Year_And_Month DESC ) as t order by yearAndMonth ASC

select * from (select Year_And_Month as yearAndMonth, Annual_Salary_Ratio as annualSalaryRatio from Enterprise_Management_Indicators_Monthly_Data where Year_And_Month between #{startTime} and #{endTime} order by Year_And_Month DESC ) as t order by yearAndMonth ASC

select * from (select Year_And_Month as yearAndMonth, Cumulative_Average_Income as cumulativeAverageIncome from Enterprise_Management_Indicators_Monthly_Data where Year_And_Month between #{startTime} and #{endTime} order by Year_And_Month DESC ) as t order by yearAndMonth ASC

select * from (select Year_And_Month as yearAndMonth, Monthly_Production_AVG_Income as monthlyProductionAVGIncome from Enterprise_Management_Indicators_Monthly_Data where Year_And_Month between #{startTime} and #{endTime} order by Year_And_Month DESC ) as t order by yearAndMonth ASC

select * from (select Year_And_Month as yearAndMonth, Monthly_Functional_AVG_Income as monthlyFunctionalAVGIncome from Enterprise_Management_Indicators_Monthly_Data where Year_And_Month between #{startTime} and #{endTime} order by Year_And_Month DESC ) as t order by yearAndMonth ASC

select * from (select Year_And_Month as yearAndMonth, Functional_Dept_Overtime_Cost as functionalDeptOvertimeCost from Enterprise_Management_Indicators_Monthly_Data where Year_And_Month between #{startTime} and #{endTime} order by Year_And_Month DESC ) as t order by yearAndMonth ASC

select * from ( select Year_And_Month, Order_Entry_Delay_Score, Order_Entry_Delay_Ratio, Shipment_Delay_Score, Shipment_Delay_Ratio, Production_Report_Delay_Score, Production_Report_Delay_Ratio, Inspection_Delay_Score, Inspection_Delay_Rate, Invoice_Posting_Delay_Score, Invoice_Posting_Delay_Rate, Unsettled_Accounts_Score, Unsettled_Accounts_Ratio from Enterprise_Management_Indicators_Daily_Clearing_Settlement where Year_And_Month between #{startTime} and #{endTime} order by Year_And_Month DESC ) as t order by Year_And_Month ASC

select * from ( select Year_And_Month, SD_SalesOrderValidityScore, SD_SalesOrderValidity, PP_ManualPOCreationRatioScore, PP_ManualPOCreationRatio, PP_DeliveredUnreportedRatioScore, PP_DeliveredUnreportedRatio, MES_LateWorkReportingScore, MES_LateWorkReportingRate, QM_ExternalInspectionDelayScore, QM_ExternalInspectionDelay, MM_PurchaseOrderLateDeliveryScore, MM_PurchaseOrderLateDelivery, MM_ManualPOCreationScore, MM_ManualPOCreation, MM_UnsettledPurchaseRequestsScore, MM_UnsettledPurchaseRequests, FICO_MonthlyStandardPriceVariationScore, FICO_MonthlyStandardPriceVariation, CrossMonthProductionOrdersScore, CrossMonthProductionOrders, PM_LateMaintenanceOrderCompletionScore, PM_LateMaintenanceOrderCompletion from Enterprise_Management_Indicators_Management where Year_And_Month between #{startTime} and #{endTime} order by Year_And_Month DESC ) as t order by Year_And_Month ASC
